mapper.sql: SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo, CATEGORY_ID categoryId, MEMBER_NO memberNo, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, CREATED_DATE createDate, MODIFIED_DATE modifiedDate, VIEW_COUNT viewCount, IS_DELETED isDeleted, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_NAME memberName FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE( CATEGORY_ID, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES( #{categoryId}, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
